spec.name: Protection
spec.description: A stalwart protector who uses a shield to safeguard herself and her allies.

spec.name: Assassination
spec.description: A deadly master of poisons who dispatches victims with vicious dagger strikes.

spec.name: Fury
spec.description: A furious berserker wielding a weapon in each hand, unleashing a flurry of attacks to carve his opponents to pieces.

spec.name: Blood
spec.description: A dark guardian who manipulates and corrupts life energy to sustain himself in the face of an enemy onslaught.

spec.name: Feral
spec.description: Takes on the form of a great cat to deal damage with bleeds and bites.

spec.name: Arms
spec.description: A battle-hardened master of two-handed weapons, using mobility and overpowering attacks to strike her opponents down.

spec.name: Enhancement
spec.description: A totemic warrior who strikes foes with weapons imbued with elemental power.

spec.name: Subtlety
spec.description: A dark stalker who leaps from the shadows to ambush her unsuspecting prey.

spec.name: Fury
spec.description: A furious berserker wielding a weapon in each hand, unleashing a flurry of attacks to carve his opponents to pieces.

spec.name: Frost
spec.description: An icy harbinger of doom, channeling runic power and delivering vicious weapon strikes.

spec.name: Discipline
spec.description: Uses magic to shield allies from taking damage as well as heal their wounds.

spec.name: Marksmanship
spec.description: A master archer or sharpshooter who excels in bringing down enemies from afar.

spec.name: Destruction
spec.description: A master of chaos who calls down fire to burn and demolish enemies.

spec.name: Frost
spec.description: Freezes enemies in their tracks and shatters them with Frost magic.

spec.name: Balance
spec.description: Can take on the form of a powerful Moonkin, balancing the power of Arcane and Nature magic to destroy enemies at a distance.
